product_description.product_description: DOROSOLS are Holcim Romania special binders for improving cohesive soils, produced as a combination of hydraulic compounds, Portland cement clinker and quicklime, in accordance with the technical specifications in force.
intended_application: Improving and stabilizing cohesive soils used for construction of embankments, foundation layers and form layers in geotechnical works and road construction
Improve soil with reduced mechanical strength (soil sensitive to humidity, compressible, swampy etc.)
Increase bearing capacity of capping layers for road construction
product_description.technical_specifications: As stipulated in the Technical Agreement
product_description.pbt_vpvb_status: The binder does not meet the criteria for PBT or vPvB in accordance with Annex XIII of Regulation (EC) No. 1907/2006 (REACH). Cement/cementitious binders are exempted from REACH registration.

manufacturing_process_details.quarrying: Extraction of calcareous materials like limestone or marl, and argillaceous materials like clay using drilling and blasting techniques.
manufacturing_process_details.crushing: Material reduced in size by compression and/or impact in mechanical crushers.
manufacturing_process_details.conveying: Raw material transported from quarry to plant using conveyors.
manufacturing_process_details.mixing_bed: Crushed limestone and clay homogenized by stacking and reclaiming in layered stockpile.
manufacturing_process_details.raw_mill: Raw materials milled and dried in vertical roller mill (Campulung Plant) and horizontal ball mill (Alesd Plant).
manufacturing_process_details.preheater: Cyclone preheaters preheat raw material before kiln entry to increase energy efficiency.
manufacturing_process_details.kiln: Rotating kiln heats raw materials up to 2000°C to form cement clinker.
manufacturing_process_details.binder_production: Cement mixed with other constituents at road binder plants; cement from Alesd mixed on site, cement from Campulung transported to Pitesti for mixing.

product_description.packaging: No packaging; products delivered only in bulk with cement trucks.
product_description.additional_information: Safety Data Sheets (SDS) publicly available on Holcim Romania portal; SDS comply with Regulation (EU) 2020/878 and Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008 (CLP).

lca_information.goal_of_study: Generate environmental profile of DOROSOLS binder produced and delivered from Holcim Romania locations to understand lifecycle environmental impacts and allow Type III EPD generation.
lca_information.declared_unit: 1 tonne of DOROSOLS produced and delivered from Holcim Romania owned and operated locations; weighted average based on production mass of each plant.
lca_information.system_boundary: Cradle to gate stage (A to A3) covering upstream (A1) and core (A2 and A3) phases; other life cycle stages not covered (MND).

data_sources_and_quality.foreground_data: Company and site-specific data validated by mass balances

lca_information.allocation: Allocation performed according to EN15804:2012+A2:2019; no co-products produced; data weighted by production mass of plants (55% and 45%).

cut_off_criteria.mass: Inputs contributing less than 5% of mass may be excluded
cut_off_criteria.energy: Inputs contributing less than 5% of energy may be excluded
cut_off_criteria.environmental_significance: Inputs with negligible environmental relevance may be excluded
assumptions: No waste produced during clinker production process
Difference between raw meal consumed and clinker produced due to water evaporation and CO2 release from decarbonation

lca_information.comparability: EPDs within same product category but from different programmes or non-compliant with EN 15804 may not be comparable.

transport_and_installation.packaging: No packaging; product delivered in bulk by cement trucks
transport_and_installation.transport: Not explicitly detailed beyond delivery in bulk by cement trucks

end_of_life.notes: End of life stages are not covered in this EPD (MND).

recycled_materials_handling.modelling_of_secondary_fuels: Secondary fuels are modelled to enter the studied system free of environmental loads; emissions during production allocated to produced products.

additional_info.sustainability_strategy: Holcim Romania implements and continuously improves an integrated management system aiming to become a NET ZERO company, in accordance with SR EN ISO 9001:2015, SR EN ISO 14001:2015, SR ISO 45001:2023, BES circular 6001:2022.
additional_info.safety_data_sheets: Available on Holcim Romania portal; comply with Regulation (EU) 2020/878 and Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008 (CLP).
